about.heading: About us
about.p1: We are a trusted engineering partner specializing in semiconductor and embedded system solutions.
about.p2: At ChipGlobe, we design and build the chips and systems that power tomorrow. Combining deep engineering expertise with innovation, we help clients deliver first-class semiconductor solutions.
about.p3: Specializing in ASICs, FPGAs, and Embedded Systems, ChipGlobe supports every stage of the product lifecycle—from concept and design to prototyping and verification.
about.p4: Our proven methodologies and senior engineering expertise ensure seamless development and reliable results.
core.heading: Our Core Competencies
core.text: Our core competencies reflect the foundation of our engineering excellence.
core.c1.title: Chip Design and Verification
core.c1.text: Innovative ASIC and FPGA design with robust verification ensuring first-time-right solutions.
core.c2.title: Embedded Systems Engineering
core.c2.text: End-to-end firmware and embedded development for intelligent, connected, and efficient systems.
core.c3.title: RTL2GDS Implementation
core.c3.text: Seamless RTL-to-GDSII flow delivering optimized, production-ready silicon layouts with precision.
core.c4.title: Co-working and Technical Guidance
core.c4.text: Collaborative engineering support and expert mentoring to accelerate your semiconductor projects.

partners.heading: Our partners
partners.text: Partnering brings together unique strengths to create outcomes neither could achieve alone. It builds trust, shared vision, and lasting impact through collaboration.
partners.c1.title: Carenuity
partners.c1.p1: Carenuity is actually a brand / business unit of ChipGlobe GmbH, which means their partnership is more of a structural integration than a collaboration between two independent companies.
partners.c1.p2: ChipGlobe, a semiconductor and embedded-systems engineering company, develops Carenuity's IoT sensor platforms, such as the SQ-Panel and the C3-Mini development board.
partners.c1.p3: Through this relationship, ChipGlobe leverages its hardware design and embedded systems expertise to bring Carenuity's mission to life — providing modular, customizable smart-home and health-tech solutions that monitor vital signs and indoor air quality.
